product_summary: Firecrawl is a web scraping and crawling tool that allows you to extract data from websites and convert it into clean markdown or structured data. It is designed to be easy to use and integrate with other tools, and it offers a variety of features to help you get the most out of your data.
product_cons: May not be able to handle all websites
Can be slow to crawl large websites
May not be able to handle complex data structures
May not be able to handle authentication or captchas

product_usecases.details: Firecrawl can be used to extract data from websites for a variety of purposes, such as market research, lead generation, and content aggregation.
Firecrawl can be used to train machine learning models on web data.
Firecrawl can be used to automate tasks such as data entry and web scraping.
Firecrawl can be used to create custom datasets for research or analysis.
Firecrawl can be used to monitor websites for changes or updates.

product_toolfor.details: Firecrawl is a good tool for anyone who needs to extract data from websites, such as researchers, journalists, and marketers.
Firecrawl is a good tool for anyone who needs to train machine learning models on web data.
Firecrawl is a good tool for anyone who needs to automate tasks such as data entry and web scraping.
Firecrawl is a good tool for anyone who needs to create custom datasets for research or analysis.
Firecrawl is a good tool for anyone who needs to monitor websites for changes or updates.
